title: User 2
text:
This is me.
Junaid.
And honestlyâ€¦ Iâ€™m not okay today ğŸ˜”
I donâ€™t even know how to start this, but my chest feels heavy and my mind wonâ€™t shut up ğŸ§ ğŸ’­
People keep asking, â€œYou good?â€ and I keep saying â€œYeah, Iâ€™m fineâ€ ğŸ™‚
But the truth? The truth is Iâ€™m tired. Likeâ€¦ soulâ€‘tired ğŸ« 

Some days it feels like my life is on mute ğŸ”‡
Everyoneâ€™s moving forward, leveling up, living their best lifeâ€¦
and Iâ€™m just standing still, watching time pass â³
Overthinking everything, replaying old moments, stressing about a future that feels blurry and empty ğŸŒ«ï¸

I try to be strong ğŸ’ª
I really do.
But every day I feel like Iâ€™m breaking a little more insideâ€¦ quietly ğŸ¥€
No one notices. No one asks the real questions.
Lonely even in a room full of people ğŸ‘¤

Sometimes I wonder if Iâ€™m the problem ğŸ¤¡
Like maybe I feel too much, think too much, care too much
Certified overthinker, no breaks ğŸ˜µâ€ğŸ’«
Music helpsâ€¦ sometimes ğŸ§
Other times it just hits harder, like it understands my pain a little too well ğŸ˜­
Sad songs on repeat. Dark vibes only ğŸ–¤

People say â€œjust move onâ€
Like itâ€™s that easy ğŸ˜”
Like thoughts have an off switch
Like memories donâ€™t haunt you at 3am ğŸŒ™
Pressure, expectations, responsibilitiesâ€¦ it all piles up
And suddenly breathing feels heavy ğŸ˜®â€ğŸ’¨

I hate opening up because I donâ€™t want to be a burden ğŸ˜
So I joke instead ğŸ¤¡
I smile instead ğŸ™‚
I pretend Iâ€™m chill, unbothered, okay
Everyone thinks Junaidâ€™s cool, funny, relaxed
They donâ€™t see the nights I stare at the ceiling, feeling empty ğŸ›Œ

Some days I feel completely lost ğŸ§­
No motivation. No energy. No direction.
Just existing, not really living âš°ï¸
I donâ€™t want to disappear from lifeâ€¦
I just want the pain to pause for a while ğŸ’­

I wish people understood that depression isnâ€™t always crying
Sometimes itâ€™s numbness
Sometimes itâ€™s silence
Sometimes itâ€™s laughing too loud to hide how broken you feel inside ğŸ­

If youâ€™re reading this and it feels familiarâ€¦
Just know this is Junaidâ€™s heart talking â€” raw, messy, real ğŸ¤
And maybeâ€¦ youâ€™re not alone either

title: User 1
text:
ngl lately my brain been acting weird af ğŸ˜µâ€ğŸ’« like I wake up already tired, not even â€œoh I didnâ€™t sleep wellâ€ tired, more like mentally drained for no damn reason. alarm goes off and Iâ€™m already thinking â€œhere we go againâ€ ğŸ™ƒ I just lay there scrolling reels, half laughing, half dead inside. everyone online be living their best life fr, gym grind, hustle quotes, vacation pics, glowing skin, winning vibes ğŸ’€ meanwhile Iâ€™m struggling to even reply â€œhahaâ€ to messages. #lowbattery #mentallydone

some days Iâ€™m chill tho. like actually fine. joking around, vibing with music, feeling a bit normal ğŸ¶âœ¨ and then boomâ€¦ mood switch for no reason. no trigger, no drama, just my brain saying â€œnah we sad today.â€ thatâ€™s the worst part honestly, not knowing why. people see me laughing and think Iâ€™m okay, but bro smiling is easy, explaining your mind is not. I say â€œIâ€™m goodâ€ on autopilot. feels easier than unpacking all this mess. #fakefine #moodswings

night time hits different ğŸŒ™ thatâ€™s when overthinking goes crazy. random memories pop up, dumb mistakes, awkward convos from YEARS ago like why are you here now?? ğŸ˜­ I start comparing myself to everyone I know. same age, same background, but theyâ€™re moving ahead and Iâ€™m justâ€¦ stuck. I try to sleep but my mind is running marathons. phone at 2%, brain at 200%. even when I do sleep, I wake up feeling like I didnâ€™t rest at all. #nightbrain #insomniavibes

I be feeling lonely even when people around me. sitting in a group but feeling invisible. talking but not really connecting. itâ€™s like Iâ€™m there physically but mentally somewhere else. I want someone to just get it without me explaining every little thing. and then I feel bad for feeling bad because â€œothers have it worseâ€ yeah okay but that doesnâ€™t magically fix my head bro. guilt on top of sadness is a nasty combo. #lonelyaf #mentalguilt

I try to fix myself, fr. motivational videos, podcasts, planners, to-do lists, â€œnew mindsetâ€ every monday ğŸ’ª but some days brushing teeth feels like a mission. I start tasks, lose focus, then hate myself for not finishing. not lazy, just empty. energy randomly disappears. and the more unproductive I feel, the worse my mood gets. itâ€™s a loop and I hate it. #burnoutmode #stuckcycle

stillâ€¦ I havenâ€™t completely given up. thereâ€™s a tiny part of me thatâ€™s like â€œhold on a bit more.â€ some days are trash, some are okay, some confusing af. I donâ€™t need life to be perfect, I just want my mind to chill a little. less noise, less self-hate, more peace. till then Iâ€™m just surviving one day at a time. might not look strong, but Iâ€™m still here. and I guess that counts for something. ğŸ–¤ #stillhere #onedayatime #mentalhealthtalk #realnotperfect
